Boosteroid August Digest

11.04.2022, 12:34

Remember we told you that something huge will happen in our July Digestin our July Digest? Now we can officially announce our brand new software! It increased the streaming bitrate from 14Mb/sec to 24Mb/sec.

New Software

Remember we told you that something huge will happen in our July Digestin our July Digest? Now we can officially announce our brand new software! It increased the streaming bitrate from 14Mb/sec to 24Mb/sec.
